subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Eric Bledsoe scored 24 points as the fourth-ranked Wildcats, playing without the highly touted freshman John Wall, beat Morehead State, 75-59, in John Calipari’s first game as coach.
snippet: Eric Bledsoe scored 24 points as the fourth-ranked Wildcats, playing without the highly touted freshman John Wall, beat Morehead State, 75-59, in John Calipari’s first game as coach.
